system.sustained:
Psyker touches target and makes Focus Power Test, on success target glows with light and is protected by a shield that reduces damage of all attacks by Psyker's Psy Rating. As long as power is maintained, it can reduce the damage of one attack, +1 per Degree of Success on Focus Power Test, after which it dissappears.
Note: Does not state if damage reduction occurs before or after AP/Toughness, wording most favours reduction after AP and Toughness.
